title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); Markdown, code highlighting, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API; supports chat, completions, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, stream, and pull models from Ruby scripts or Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper with fzf model picker, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing Ollama binary and module for declarative macOS/NixOS deployments.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds a local AI assistant powered by any Ollama model to your knowledge base.

title: ollama-mistral-ax
summary: Mistral function-calling adapter for Ollama via llama-cpp-agent; enables structured tool use.

title: ollama-gui-tools
summary: Experimental desktop GUI (Tauri + React) for managing Ollama models and chats across macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; pipe objects to models and stream responses.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Community Zig client library for Ollama with cross-platform HTTP backend and build.zig integration.
